import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		int a = sc.nextInt();
		for(int i=1;i<=a;i++) {
			for(int j=a-i;j>0;j--) {
				System.out.print(" ");
			}
			for(int k=1;k<=i;k++) {
				System.out.print("*");
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
	}

}
